name: Reef Cushion Bounce Phantom Flips - Men's
description: Casual, slip-on footwear with Cushion Bounce shaped footbeds that provide anatomic arch support. Leather upper notches up the style of a shorts-T combo.Soft faux-leather upper for durability.High-energy cushion footbed for comfort in each step.Anatomically contoured midsole with arch support and heel cupping for added comfort.High-density rubber sponge outsole for durable traction.
